meanings.sent1: She will continuate her studies even during the holidays.
meanings.sent2: The river continuated to flow steadily throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: The marathon runner decided to continuate running even after twisting her ankle.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music continuated to burn brightly in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The bond between the two friends was so strong that it continuated to grow stronger with each passing day.

meanings.definition: Continuous or uninterrupted in time or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The continuate rain made the roads slippery.
meanings.sent2: The continuate hum of the air conditioner was soothing.
meanings.sent3: The continuate ticking of the clock became a background melody.
meanings.sent4: Her continuate smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The continuate flow of ideas in his mind inspired him to create beautiful art.
